title: Elon Musk links SpaceX and xAI in a record
description: SpaceX's acquisition of xAI signals a bold push to merge artificial intelligence with space infrastructure at an unprecedented scale.
content:
SpaceX confirmed on Monday that it has acquired xAI, formally combining two of Elon Musk’s most ambitious ventures and creating what could become the world’s most valuable private company.

title: ‘Deepfakes spreading and more AI companions’: seven takeaways from the latest artificial intelligence safety report
description: Annual review highlights growing capabilities of AI models, while examining issues from cyber-attacks to job disruption
content:
1. The capabilities of AI models are improving
A host of new AI models – the technology that underpins tools like chatbots – were released last year, including OpenAI’s GPT-5, Anthropic’s Claude Opus 4.5 and Google’s Gemini 3. The report points to ne... [7177 chars]

title: Navigating GenAI: Redefining Learning and Integrity in Higher Education
description: Generative artificial intelligence is reshaping higher education by incorporating chatbots into teaching and assessment. A study reveals that AI poses challenges like cheating but also offers inclusive learning tools. Key skills include prompting, critical thinking, and writing, as educators adapt to a post-plagiarism era and promote ethical AI use.
content: Calgary, Canada - In a rapidly evolving education landscape, generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) is now integral to how students and educators learn and assess knowledge. A qualitative study with 28 educators from Canadian universities highlig... [519 chars]

title: SpaceX acquires xAI in record-setting deal as Musk looks to unify AI and space ambitions
description: Elon Musk forges one of tech’s most ambitious mergers yet, folding xAI into SpaceX to fuse artificial intelligence, space and defense into a single trillion-dollar powerhouse.
content:
The transaction values SpaceX at $1 trillion, and xAI at $250 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.
Investors in xAI will receive 0.1433 shares of SpaceX for every share of xAI ​as part of the acquisition, this person said. Some xA... [2237 chars]

title: OpenAI launches Codex app to gain ground in AI coding race
description: OpenAI said it designed its Codex app to make it easy for users to simultaneously manage multiple artificial-intelligence agents over a long period of time.
content:
OpenAI is launching a desktop app for its coding tool, Codex, in hopes of seizing momentum – and customers – from its rivals in the AI code-generation space.
